Classes in org.accada.epcis.repository used by org.accada.epcis.repository.query
EpcisQueryCallbackInterface
           The EPCIS Query Callback Interface is the path by which an EPCIS service delivers standing query results to a client.
EpcisQueryControlInterface
           The EPCIS Query Control Interface provides a general framework by which client applications may query EPCIS data.
